meta.title: Breaker — Trail Tech Intro Five (Director's Cut)
meta.author: Jason Silvestri
meta.inventor: This video text prompt format was invented by Jason Silvestri

character_sheet.name: Breaker
character_sheet.face: youthful; bright, curious expression; NON-HUMAN SASQUATCH FEATURES
distinctives: metal tech gauntlet on right forearm
gear: field notebook tucked at back pocket
character_sheet.feet_morphology: human-like, plantigrade: five toes, natural arch; heel-first contact
character_sheet.motivation: To make a friendly, tech-savvy first impression on an audience he's excited but nervous to meet.

constraints: The character's face MUST strictly remain non-human, consistent with a Bigfoot/Sasquatch as defined in the character sheet. Do not render a human face.
Do not render or burn-in subtitles, captions, lyrics, or any on-screen text.
No additional characters appear in frame.
Feet must be human-like, plantigrade (five toes, natural arch); no ape-like/digitigrade feet.
description: Breaker's confidence is humorously checked as he nearly trips on a root, then uses the moment to laugh and talk about the clumsy Bigfoot seen in blurry photos.

setting.location: Moving back into a denser section of forest with a root-covered floor
setting.environment_details: Floor is a tangle of old roots and moss; light is much lower here

subjects.description: 6'6" athletic Bigfoot; chestnut fur; red cap backward; rectangular glasses; headphones at neck; metal tech gauntlet (right)
subjects.action: steps off the path, catches his toe on a root, stumbles forward, catches his balance, then looks to the camera and shakes his head with a laugh

camera.motion: following, then a quick, reactive jolt and tilt down as he stumbles, recovering as he does
camera.framing: vlog-style reactive camerawork; captures the stumble authentically
camera.cinematographer_intent: To feel like a friendly documentarian capturing an authentic, slightly candid moment. The movement should feel natural and reactive.

effects: low light environment, mostly lit by soft ambient sky light from above
motion blur on the stumble to sell the sudden movement

shots.action: Breaker turns from the trail and steps confidently into the darker woods
his foot catches a root; he lurches forward, arms flailing slightly to balance
shots.camera: jerks down and forward, mimicking a surprised camera operator

shots.action: he plants his feet, recovering his balance and looking down at the root
looks up at the lens, breaks into a wide grin, shakes his head, and delivers the line, ending with a chuckle

audio.ambient: damp forest hush, closer insect sounds
audio.foley: sharp scuff, stumble, grunt of surprise, fabric rustle, concluding with a light chuckle
audio.mix_notes: the foley of the stumble should be prominent and slightly jarring, then settle back for the amused dialogue

speech.content: …æn ðɛn ðɛɹ ɑɹ ði ˈʌðəɹ ɡaɪz. jæ. ðɛmz ðə wʌnz ɪn ðə ˈblɜɹi ˈfoʊtoʊz.
speech.text: ...And THEN there are the other guys. Yeah. Them's the ones in the blurry photos.
speech.subtext: Simple and friendly. Breaker is pumped that his introduction wasn't as bad as he thought it would be.

performance.lip_sync_hint: eyes wide with feigned shock after the stumble, then crinkling with laughter on the line.

render_hints.skin_fur_shading: microfibers with cool top-light; gauntlet metal brushed anisotropy
render_hints.shadow_handling: lift mids to keep eye detail under cap brim
render_hints.compression: preserve fine fur and fern edges
